definition: foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: I suffer from beriberi to already had a few years, need to change sandal to just go to the summer.
sentences.chinese: 我患脚气病已有几年了，一到夏季需换上凉鞋才行。

sentences.english: For washing, sterilization, can remove the smell of sweat, beriberi.
sentences.chinese: 用来洗脚，具有杀菌作用，能去除汗臭味，脚气。

sentences.english: When the fungus that causes jock itch targets the feet, you have athlete’s foot.
sentences.chinese: 当引发你股癣的真菌感染你的双脚时，你就会得脚气。

sentences.english: This brings us back to Polish scientist Casimir Funk and the link between rice hulls and beriberi.
sentences.chinese: 这又使得我们谈到芬克以及稻壳和脚气之间的关系。

sentences.english: Diuretic treatment athlete's foot swelling, red bean porridge win supplements.
sentences.chinese: 利尿消肿治脚气，赤豆粥里胜补剂。

sentences.english: This substance was believed to cure a disorder called beriberi.
sentences.chinese: 人们认为这种物质可以治疗一种叫做脚气病的失调病。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the CT appearance and diagnostic value of brain type infantile beriberi (thiamine deficiency).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨婴儿脑型脚气病的CT表现特点及诊断价值。

sentences.english: Toenail fungus can be eliminated by soaking your feet in a bath of Listerine mouthwash.
sentences.chinese: 用漱口水溶液浸泡双脚可以根除脚气。

sentences.english: What method or medicaments can control athlete's foot?
sentences.chinese: 有什么办法或药物可以治脚气？

sentences.english: To feet, has a bactericidal effect, to remove sweat odor, athlete's foot.
sentences.chinese: 用来洗脚，具有杀菌作用，能去除汗臭味，脚气。

sentences.english: Athlete’s foot is treated with antifungal cream.
sentences.chinese: 涂抹抗真菌乳膏也能治脚气。

sentences.english: He empties some foot powder into his pockets.
sentences.chinese: 他将一些脚气药粉倒在自己的口袋中。

sentences.english: A fungal infection of the skin, especially athlete's foot.
sentences.chinese: 脚气，香港脚皮肤的一种细菌性感染，尤其是。

sentences.english: Beriberi is caused by an inability to assimilate thiamine.
sentences.chinese: 不能吸收维生素B1就导致脚气病。

definition: tinea cruris, fungal skin infection of the groin/dermatomycosis, esp. sexually transmitted/jock itch
vaginal infection/inflammation of the vulva or vagina/colpitis
